quotes.quote: People are messy; therefore, relationships will be messy. Don't be surprised by messiness.
The truth is messy. It's raw and uncomfortable. You can't blame people for preferring lies.
Don't call the world dirty because you forgot to clean your glasses.
No one has a right to occupy the privileged position all the time, so it should be contested. It should always be messy in there.
A messy kitchen is a sign of happiness.
Those who think profit is a dirty word should try to make one.
Cleaning anything involves making something else dirty, but anything can get dirty without something else getting clean.
If it's dirty, it's not funny, but if it's funny, it's not dirty.
It's easy to make a mess when you're not the one who has to clean it up.
Good guys need to be a little dirty otherwise they're just boring.
Surely it's better to love others, however messy and imperfect the involvement, than to allow one's capacity for love to harden.
A problem is only a problem when viewed as a problem. All change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.
Like life, revenge can be a messy business. And both would be much simpler if only our heads could figure out which way our hearts will go. But the heart has its reasons, of which reason cannot know.
Life itself is a haphazard, untidy, messy affair.
Messy is a word we use to explain a conflict with an expectation we had. Eliminate the expectation, and you eliminate the messy.
The truth is messy. It's raw and uncomfortable. You can't blame people for preferring lies.
There are parts of his life and personality that are extremely messy, and that's the truth.
It's good to leave your room super-messy when you're away. Whoever tries to break into your room will thought it has already been ransacked.
Beginnings are always messy.
Man is messy, but any creature that can create space vehicles can probably cope.
The dirty truth is that many people find fascism to be not particularly horrible.
What a filthy mind you have. Can't imagine why you're single with a brain as dirty as the one you've got.
Life is so messy that the temptation to straighten it up is very strong. And the results always illusory.
Emotions are messy and hard to figure out.
A messy house is a must it separates your true friends from other friends. Real friends are there to visit you not your house!
Family love is messy, clinging, and of an annoying and repetitive pattern, like bad wallpaper.
Emotion is messy, contradictory... and true.
Excuse the mess, but we live here.
Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.
